title: V1: Chip can start a build from a rough idea
description: Implement ao project add CLI command and ao start --prompt flag with discover-first orchestrator prompt. Spec: specs/001-chip-to-orchestrator/V1-plan.md
close_reason: V1 implemented: ao project add command, ao start --prompt flag with discover-first prompt, tests passing

title: Fix auto-start gap: thread initialPrompt through spawnOrchestrator
description: When ao start --prompt is used, the orchestrator agent launches with system prompt but no initial user message, so it waits at the prompt. Thread initialPrompt from OrchestratorSpawnConfig through session-manager.ts to AgentLaunchConfig.prompt so claude-code gets the -p flag.
close_reason: Auto-start fix verified: initialPrompt threads through spawnOrchestrator to AgentLaunchConfig.prompt, agent launches with -p flag and starts building immediately. Smoke test passed clean in 1m56s.

title: V1 hardening: bulletproof Chip-to-Orchestrator pipeline
description: Fix 8 gaps from V1 smoke test: permission defaults, git validation, branch detection, port collision, process cleanup, path validation, tilde expansion, activity detection. All must work without manual intervention.
